app.admin.title: Insufficient rights
app.admin.body:
This application requires administrator rights.
Please restart the application as administrator.
app.subtitle: Performance ¬∑ Disk Cleanup ¬∑ System Security ¬∑ Gaming
security.title: SECURITY GUARANTEE
security.body: This program never deletes your game files, settings, saves, documents or applications. It only removes temporary files and caches that are automatically recreated. No personal data is affected.
card.custom.title: CHOOSE WHAT I WANT TO CLEAN
card.custom.body: Check exactly what you want to remove. Each option is explained with what it touches and what it doesn't. Full control guaranteed.
card.quick.title: Quick Clean
card.gaming.title: Gaming + Disk Optimization
card.deep.title: Deep Clean
card.sysopt.title: System Repair & Optimization
card.thirdparty.title: Third-Party App Caches
card.bloat.title: BLOATWARE REMOVAL
card.bloat.body: Permanently removes: Candy Crush, Facebook, TikTok, Xbox GameBar, Cortana, Netflix, Solitaire, Mixed Reality, Bing + disables Microsoft telemetry.
card.bloat.warning: Xbox GameBar (Win+G) will be removed. Games themselves are not affected.
card.driver.title: Driver Updates
card.driver.s1.label: Detects and installs drivers:
card.driver.s1.items:
GPU (NVIDIA, AMD, Intel Arc)
Chipset, audio, USB 3 controllers
Network, Wi-Fi, Bluetooth drivers
main.confirm.title: Confirmation
main.forceclose.title: Open applications
main.forceclose.body:
The following applications are open:

{0}

Close them now for a more thorough clean?
(You can reopen them after cleaning)
main.deepclean.confirm:
DEEP CLEAN

This cleaning includes:
  - Everything from Quick Clean
  - Developer caches (npm, pip, gradle, NuGet)
  - Windows Update cache (old files)
  - Defragmentation and DISM
  - Browsers (Chrome, Firefox, Edge, Brave, Vivaldi, Opera GX)

Dev caches will re-download on next build.
A restore point will be created automatically.

Duration: 60-120 minutes. Continue?
main.sysopt.confirm:
SYSTEM REPAIR & OPTIMIZATION

7 steps:
  - SFC /scannow
  - DISM /RestoreHealth
  - DISM StartComponentCleanup
  - Full network reset + DNS 1.1.1.1
  - Rebuild font cache
  - TRIM / Defragmentation

SFC and DISM may take 30 to 90 minutes.
Continue?
main.bloat.confirm:
BLOATWARE REMOVAL

The following apps will be PERMANENTLY removed:
  - Candy Crush and King games
  - Facebook, Instagram, TikTok
  - Xbox GameBar (Win+G will no longer work)
  - Cortana, Bing Search
  - Netflix, Microsoft Solitaire, Clipchamp
  - Mixed Reality Portal
  + Disable Microsoft telemetry

Your games and third-party apps (Steam, Epic, etc.) are NOT affected.

Continue?
main.advanced.confirm:
ADVANCED MODE - DEEP CLEANING

This mode includes everything:
  - Full clean + gaming + third-party apps
  - System optimization (SFC, DISM, network)
  - Windows bloatware removal
  - Automatic restore point creation

Estimated duration: 90-180 minutes

Continue?

page.about.title: About
about.description: PC Clean is a Windows optimization and maintenance tool. It cleans temporary files, browser and application caches, and allows you to repair system components. No personal data is collected or sent.

card.quick.s1.label: What is cleaned:
card.quick.s1.items:
Temporary Windows files (%TEMP%, C:\Windows\Temp)
Browser caches (Chrome, Firefox, Edge, Brave)
Windows thumbnails
Prefetch (recreated on next startup)
Recycle bins on all drives
Windows logs (system logs)
card.quick.never.label: NEVER touches:
card.quick.never.items: saves, game files, installed apps, documents
card.gaming.s1.label: What is cleaned:
card.gaming.s1.items:
Steam shader cache (recreated, only slows down 1st run)
Steam, Epic Games, Battle.net logs and dumps
DirectX / GPU shader cache (D3DSCache)
Discord, Spotify, OBS cache (logs only)
card.gaming.s2.label: Disk optimization:
card.gaming.s2.items:
HDD: intelligent sector defragmentation
SSD: TRIM (frees unused blocks)
Disk error check (chkdsk /scan)
card.gaming.never.label: NEVER touches:
card.deep.s1.label: Everything from Quick Clean +
card.deep.s1.items:
Developer caches (npm, pip, gradle, NuGet)
Deep browser cleaning
Windows Update cache (old files)
Defragmentation + Windows component cleanup
Restore point created automatically before
card.deep.info.label: Note:
card.deep.info.text: Dev caches (npm, pip...) will re-download on next build. Normal.
card.sysopt.s1.label: 7 Windows repair steps:
card.sysopt.s1.items:
SFC /scannow - checks Windows file integrity
DISM /RestoreHealth - repairs Windows image
DISM StartComponentCleanup - frees WinSxS space
Network reset (Winsock, IP) + Cloudflare DNS 1.1.1.1
Rebuild font cache
TRIM and defragmentation of all drives
card.sysopt.dur.label: Duration:
card.sysopt.dur.text: SFC and DISM can take 30-90 min. PC stays usable.
card.thirdparty.intro: Removes only caches and logs (not the apps themselves):
card.thirdparty.items:
Discord (GPU cache, code cache)
Spotify (storage cache)
Teams and Slack (cache)
OBS Studio (logs only)
Steam logs/dumps - Epic logs - Battle.net cache
page.apps.title: Applications
apps.intro: Enable only the applications you actually use. Cleaning of disabled applications will be skipped, which speeds up the process and makes the report more relevant.
settings.section.title: ‚öôÔ∏è Cleaning Options
settings.autorestore.label: Automatic restore point
settings.autorestore.desc: Create a Windows restore point before each deep clean.
settings.autoopen.label: Auto-open report
settings.autoopen.desc: Open the reports window at the end of each cleaning session.
settings.skipdisabled.label: Skip disabled apps
settings.skipdisabled.desc: Do not clean applications that are marked as disabled in the Applications tab.
